mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_LOCALIZED_RESOURCE ( F_OWNER_RESOURCE_ID, F_LOCALE, F_VALUE, F__LAST_UPDATED_AT ) VALUES ( #{ ownerResourceId }, #{ locale }, #{ value }, (strftime('%s', 'now') * 1000) )
mapper.update: UPDATE T_LOCALIZED_RESOURCE SET F_VALUE = #{ value }, F__LAST_UPDATED_AT = (strftime('%s', 'now') * 1000) WHERE F_OWNER_RESOURCE_ID = #{ ownerResourceId } AND F_LOCALE = #{ locale } AND F__LAST_UPDATED_AT = #{ _lastUpdatedAt }
mapper.select: SELECT T1.F_OWNER_RESOURCE_ID AS "ownerResourceId", T1.F_LOCALE AS "locale", T1.F_VALUE AS "value", T1.F__LAST_UPDATED_AT AS "_lastUpdatedAt", T1.F_VALUE AS "_title", T2.F_DEFAULT_VALUE AS "owner_title" FROM T_LOCALIZED_RESOURCE T1 LEFT JOIN T_RESOURCE T2 ON T1.F_OWNER_RESOURCE_ID = T2.F_RESOURCE_ID WHERE T1.F_OWNER_RESOURCE_ID = #{ ownerResourceId } AND T1.F_LOCALE = #{ locale }
SELECT MAX(T1.F__LAST_UPDATED_AT) AS "max_lastUpdatedAt", COUNT(*) AS "count", 0 AS "focus" FROM T_LOCALIZED_RESOURCE T1

SELECT T1.F_RESOURCE_ID AS "resourceId", T1.F_OWNER_PROJECT_ID AS "ownerProjectId", T1.F_DEFAULT_VALUE AS "defaultValue", T1.F__LAST_UPDATED_AT AS "_lastUpdatedAt", T1.F_DEFAULT_VALUE AS "_title", T2.F_PROJECT_NAME || '(' || T2.F_TITLE || ')' AS "owner_title" FROM T_RESOURCE T1 LEFT JOIN T_PROJECT T2 ON T1.F_OWNER_PROJECT_ID = T2.F_PROJECT_ID WHERE T1.F_RESOURCE_ID = #{ ownerResourceId }
